title: Zotek F30
description: Lightweight foam used for insulation, cushioning, and impact protection in space environments.

title: Cargo Transfer Bags (CTB)
description: Reusable storage bags used to transfer items between spacecraft and stations. Made from durable fabric suitable for reuse or repurposing.

title: Clothing
description: Old fabric clothing can be reused as thermal insulation, cleaning materials, or repurposed into new fiber composites.

title: Towels / Wash Cloths
description: Used towels can be sterilized and repurposed as filters, insulation layers, or padding materials.

title: Cleaning Wipes
description: Worn cleaning wipes can be compacted and reused in water recovery or polymer recycling processes.

title: Overwrap
description: Plastic overwrap materials can be melted and reused as 3D printing filament or sealing material.

title: Rehydratable Pouch
description: Used for storing rehydratable food. After use, pouches can be cleaned and reused for sample storage or recycled as plastic sheets.

title: Aluminum Structure / Struts
description: Strong lightweight structures used for supporting components; waste aluminum can be melted and recast for new tools or parts.

title: Polymer Matrix Composites
description: Composite materials combining resin and fiber; can be reshaped or recycled into paneling or insulation boards.

title: Air Cushion
description: Protective air-filled cushions can be deflated, sterilized, and reused for impact protection or padding.

title: Bubble Wrap Filler
description: Bubble wrap waste can be melted and recycled into lightweight polymer blocks or packing inserts.

title: Reclosable Bags
description: Reusable plastic bags that can store samples, tools, or waste materials. Easily sterilized for reuse.

title: Anti-Static Bubble Wrap Bags
description: Used for sensitive electronics; can be reused after cleaning or melted into new polymer films.

title: Plastazote LD45 FR
description: Flame-retardant polyethylene foam that can be reshaped into thermal padding or protective casings.

title: Nitrile Gloves
description: Disposable gloves that can be sterilized and repurposed as grip liners or recycled into polymer feedstock.
